tourName: Amazing Adriatic Honeymoon Tour in Croatia
placesVisited: Dubrovnik, Bay of Kotor, Perast, Hvar, Split, Trogir
generalInfo: Allow the charming culture and hallowed history of Croatia to enchant you and your partner on this handcrafted 8-day honeymoon. Designed with intimacy in mind, this tour's adventures will lead you to luxurious palaces draped in Baroque details, sweeping mountain landscapes dripping with breathtaking allure, and sun-kissed shores that glimmer among other seductive experiences from Dubrovnik to Split. Come and see why Croatia is the ideal destination for the perfect honeymoon.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik - Pictures of the Adriatic
dayInfo.description: Massive stone walls surround the seaside city of Dubrovnik, a preserved 16th-Century locale imbued with heritage in which you can discover shortly after landing at the international airport and transfer to your accommodation. The ceaseless glitter of the Adriatic Sea, Baroque buildings, and enchanting courtyards are only a few of the many bewitching scenes that will welcome you to Croatia. Your afternoon will be at your leisure, allowing you to idle along medieval walkways shrouded in the seductive aromas of succulent seafood dishes.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik - Discovery of Dubrovnikâs Heritage
dayInfo.description: Both picturesque and drenched in a bewildering history, Dubrovnik will be the grounds on which you will explore limestone streets, iconic monasteries, and grand palaces today. After strolling the paved paths of Dubrovnikâs main street, you will soon reach the Franciscan Church and Monastery. The ancient religious complex is embellished with medieval stylings and is a marvelous display of Croatiaâs long-established spiritual roots. Your tour will continue to Rector's Palace, which is the century-old seat of the Rector of the Republic of Ragusa. You will also be able to witness the bejeweled Dubrovnik Synagogue, which is the oldest Sephardic Synagogue in the world.

dayInfo.title: Dubrovnik - Getaway to Montenegro
dayInfo.description: Your honeymoon in Croatia will also share magical moments beyond the Croatian border. Today, you will transfer to the Bay of Kotor in the neighboring Balkan country of Montenegro to witness panoramas of some breathtaking landscapes. The bay, also known as Boka, is one of the most remarkable settings on the planet; it is rife with azure inlets and soaring cliffs. By cruising the bay at your own pace, you can make your way to Perast to cherish scenes of the sprouting bougainvilleas that emerge from cracks of emblematic ruins. After you have had your fill of Montenegro, you will return to your accommodation in Dubrovnik.

dayInfo.title: Hvar - The Golden Shores of Hvar
dayInfo.description: Your honeymoon would be incomplete without visiting a sun-kissed island, and there is none better than Croatiaâs Adriatic haven of Hvar. After breakfast, you will set sail across the sea aboard a stylish catamaran, bathing in the glistening sunshine and feeling the gentle sea breeze against your cheeks. Your voyage will lead you to Hvarâs resplendent shores, which are enveloped in a swanky holiday-making atmosphere. You can spend your first evening on Hvar brushing shoulders with the posh visitors or escaping as a couple to a hideaway viewpoint that is known for being a spot for sweeping sunsets views.

dayInfo.title: Hvar - Pakleni or Hvarâs Caves
dayInfo.description: The Paklinski islands lay veiled in lush colors just beyond Hvar's harbor. They are the crown jewel of the Adriatic and a stunning cluster of wooded islands that will conjure images of an idyllic day among the crystal-clear water that surrounds Hvar. You may be whisked away to these postcard-perfect slices of paradise by boat to paddle gracefully across their turquoise seascapes. You can also find comfort in the charming caves that are sprinkled throughout Hvarâs isolated forest landscapes. Across land or sea, the choice will be yours of how you spend the day.

dayInfo.title: Hvar - Seduced by Croatiaâs Fine Wine
dayInfo.description: Croatia is not just a pretty place; it is dripping in culture that you will uncover during a half-day wine tour that will commence in the afternoon. Your adventures will lead you from the white-sand beaches to the luxuriant headlands and lush countryside. Here, a collection of grape vineyards rolls across bucolic pastures. You and your partner will meet the minds behind some of Croatiaâs best wines and introduce your palates to their distinct flavor profiles. Vistas of Hvarâs wild beauty and aromas of the lavender fields will set the perfect sipping scene.

dayInfo.title: Split - Roman and Renaissance History
dayInfo.description: Split is an exuberant Croatian city full of traditional culture and contemporary flavor that will absorb your attention shortly you arrive on its humming shores by catamaran. You and a guide will peruse the luxuries of Split within the royal Diocletian's Palace, which is a significant piece of Roman history that is as beautiful as it is enlightening. Your tour will continue to the Temple of Jupiter, among other heritage sites, before you reach the medieval town of Trogir. You can meander its Renaissance roads before returning to your accommodation in Split in the evening.

dayInfo.title: Split - Your Final Morning
dayInfo.description: Your enthralling honeymoon in Croatia will culminate magically among the buzzing energy of Splitâs cityscape. Although this is your final morning, there will still be a few moments to appreciate this Croatian destination and your amazing honeymoon, whether savoring local delicacies or purchasing commemorative trinkets. You can spend these last minutes together in the idyllic atmosphere of Split before transferring to the airport for your departure.
